freezeSpell.name: freezeSpell
freezeSpell.humanReadableEffect: Affected player gets "frozen" and cannot move for 2 seconds

blindSpell.name: blindSpell
blindSpell.humanReadableEffect: Affected players become "blinded" and their screens go dark for 2 seconds

healSpell.name: healSpell
healSpell.humanReadableEffect: Restores 10% of your health every 0.5 seconds

invisibleSpell.name: invisibleSpell
invisibleSpell.humanReadableEffect: Makes your player invisible for 5 seconds

speedSpell.name: speedSpell
speedSpell.humanReadableEffect: Makes your player move 1.5x faster for 5 seconds

teleportSpell.name: teleportSpell
teleportSpell.humanReadableEffect: Teleports your player to its location when it either reaches its target or hits another player

shockSpell.name: shockSpell
shockSpell.humanReadableEffect: Affected player loses 75 health every 1 seconds, a total of 3 times

slowSpell.name: slowSpell
slowSpell.humanReadableEffect: Affected players get slowed down to 50% of their original speed for 2 seconds
